description: Lance Hart is the Florida favourite pick for governor. He thinks he has it in the bag, no matter how many times he has been publicly busted for bad behaviour. His weakness - women, his kryptonite, dirty sex! He plays right into the hands of Yasmin Lee who encourages Lance to show her his butt plug that he has been wearing throughout the entire high class fundraiser for his campaign. When Lance falls for the irresistible bait, Yasmin goes in for the kill! She punishes Lance with her cock while he is bound to bed posts with his neckties. Yasmin delivers an ass fucking like he has never experienced before. She films their escapade, being careful not to catch her own face in the sex tape. All the while the Govenor hopeful opens his mouth and ass for a reaming and laps up her cum. When he returns to his fundraiser, his PR manager informs him there is a very damaging sex tape about to surface and on top of that a new candidate in the running. Hmmm, who might that may be.....
title: West Wing Porn - The dirtiest business of All - Politics
